page.title: 12FARMS
page.content: Our house is on Parknowe Farm in a row of three houses.We have three bedrooms my sister and I share a bedroom which has pink wallpaper with small flowers on it and the sheets on the bed match. My brother sleeps in his own brown bedroom. My Mum and Dad's room has a double bed in the middle of the room. The kitchen wallpaper is red and white and there are two windows looking into the garden.The sitting room has French windows into the garden. Katharine Kennedy. I live in a cottage, which belongs to Pitcullo Farm.It has a blue door.There are three windows downstairs and four upstairs.Downstairs we have the living room,kitchen and bathroom and upstairs there are four bedrooms. Neil Aichison.
